page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT TECHNOLOGY
page.content: { {Massey Ferguson, Banner Lane, Coventry is advertised as the largest tractor producing factory in the western world. The site covers 35 hectares, employs over 400 people, produces 75 000 tractor sets per annum. New technology at present being installed includes paint spraying robots able to recognize 250 variables.With manaul spraying each operator can only safely work in 1/2 hour shifts, the robot will work untiringly.An atomic absorb_ tion spectrophometer carries out the analysis of components in 1/2 the time needed by the previous process.The stores are now controlled by bar coding computers.A multi_langauge computer indexes the purchasing department,70% of the cost of M.F. products is controlled by purchasing.
